>London Music Hackday Photos

06 Sep 2010


So, I spent two days with a bunch of people who are very passionate about music and hacking. I'd never been to a hackday before, but I was glad I finally got around to it. I spent most of the time helping out in the hardware room where we had quite a few good hacks. Coverage of the day and all the projects are available at http://london.musichackday.org/2010/ and my photos are all up at http://www.flickr.com/people/section9
